mapper.sql: id, code, order_sn as orderSN, user_phone as userPhone, item_desc as itemDesc, original_price as originalPrice, order_price as orderPrice, rest_price as restPrice, create_time as createTime, expire_time as expireTime, is_use as isUse, using_time as usingTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO (code, hospital_id, item_id, order_sn, user_phone, item_desc, original_price, order_price, rest_price, create_time, expire_time, is_use) VALUES (#{code}, #{hospitalId}, #{itemId}, #{orderSN}, #{userPhone}, #{itemDesc}, #{originalPrice}, #{orderPrice}, #{restPrice}, #{createTime}, #{expireTime}, #{isUse})
mapper.update: UPDATE SET is_use=#{isUse}, using_time=#{usingTime} WHERE code=#{code} AND is_use=0
